description: Lists the knowledge bases in an account. The list also includesinformation about each knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of knowledge bases with information about each knowledge base.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time the knowledge base was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
